content: Comfortably edit and collaborate on docs no matter what size your team is.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the benefits of a feature that enables comfortable editing and collaboration on documents, regardless of team size. It will appear in UI elements related to pro upgrade or enterprise features.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Mukava muokata ja tehdä yhteistyötä asiakirjoilla tiimin koosta riippumatta' is a literal translation, but lacks the nuance of 'Comfortably edit and collaborate'. 'Mukava' translates to 'pleasant' or 'comfortable', but the sentence reads slightly awkward in Finnish. It could be improved to convey a sense of ease and scalability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voit muokata ja tehdä yhteistyötä asiakirjoissa, riippumatta tiimisi koosta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb tense in the French translation is slightly awkward. 'Editez' is the imperative form and doesn't flow naturally with 'coéditez.' A more natural phrasing would use the present indicative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Modifiez et coéditez vos documents confortablement quelle que soit la taille de votre équipe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'quelle que soit la taille de votre équipe' is a more formal way of saying 'no matter the size of your team.' For a banner item, a slightly more colloquial phrasing might be better to increase engagement.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: peu importe la taille de votre équipe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'Edite e colabore confortavelmente documentos' is awkward. 'Edite e colabore confortavelmente em documentos' would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Edite e colabore confortavelmente em documentos

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Редактируйте документы и работайте над ними совместно в команде любого размера' is a functional translation but loses the nuance of 'Comfortably edit and collaborate'. It reads as a statement of possibility rather than emphasizing ease and comfort.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Редактируйте и сотрудничайте над документами легко, независимо от размера вашей команды.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation conveys the meaning, but "ලේඛනවල සහයෝගයෙන් වැඩ කරන්න" is a bit literal and could be more naturally phrased. "ලේඛනයන්හි එක්ව වැඩ කරන්න" or "ලේඛනයන් gemeinsam bearbeitet" would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ කණ්ඩායම කෙතරම් වුවත්, පහසුවෙන් සංස්කරණය කරන්න සහ ලේඛනයන් gemeinsam bearbeitet.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly an error, the punctuation and spacing could be refined for a more polished feel. Consider adding a comma after 'ඔබගේ කණ්ඩායම' and possibly adjusting spacing around conjunctions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ කණ්ඩායම, කෙතරම් වුවත් පහසුවෙන් සංස්කරණය කරන්න සහ ලේඛනයන් gemeinsam bearbeitet.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'уређујте' (uređujte) is technically correct, but 'радити на' (raditi na) or 'обрађујте' (obrađujte) might be more natural and professional sounding in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Удобно радити на или Удобно обрађујте

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'tima' is grammatically incorrect. It should be 'tima' (team).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Udobno uređujte i sarađujte na dokumentima bez obzira na veličinu vašeg tima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "任何规模的团队都可以易于编辑和协作文档" doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Comfortably edit and collaborate'. It translates to 'Teams of any size can easily edit and collaborate on documents', losing the emphasis on the *comfort* aspect. It implies ease, but not necessarily comfort.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that emphasizes comfort and ease, such as "无论团队规模如何，都可以轻松舒适地编辑和协作文档" or "团队规模不再是问题，可以轻松自在地编辑和协作文档".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Chinese translation doesn't quite follow natural flow. While grammatically correct, the phrasing feels a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing for smoother reading. The previous suggestions address this as well.
